title: Professionally managed, Best Price 1bed Apartment for Rent in Brighton
posting_body: This apartment is right on Washington Street in Brighton Center and it's very  close to variety transportation:
For Bus line: 501 (express to Financial District), 503 (Express to Copley), 57 (Kenmore), 86 (Cambridge), 65 Bus stop (Longwood Medical area).
Also it located right between Boston Landing Station (only takes 14 mins to The Fenway) and or B-line (Green-line)
Washington Street T-stop / Whole Foods so  it's walking distance to either location.
Easy Parking with or without resident permit (MA license plate is not required).
There's variety Market, Shops & Bakery, Fitness center & Restaurants and Cafes (Caffe Nero, Starbucks, Dunkin), Bank (BOA, TD, Citizens Bank) in this location.

This well layout unit featuring a large living room with big sunny windows, NEW hardwood floors throughout,  large eat-in kitchen with gas range and refrigerator, spacious bedroom with two closets, a clean bathroom.
